text: It was Nick who found the answer."Only one thing for it, Mum," he said, sitting on the edge of the bed and holding one of her hands in his."Let Fred and Mag have the two upstairs rooms between them. Sam will have to come out of his kennel.
handwritten_text: It was Nick who found the answer."Only one thing for it, Mum," he said, sitting on the edge of the bed and holding one of her hands in his."Let Fred and Mag have the two upstairs rooms between them. Sam will have to come out of his kennel.
